text: tawraat kitaabal Nafsi Nafsih qidaanaah, inti intih yayyaaqeenim, San Sanah yargiqeeniih, Ayti Aytih yargiqeenim, moddina moddinah Siibaanaah, xagarak muddumtem kee hinnay Qanxixxeemil canê gacsi yanim fardi keenil abne, isit tekkem cabeeh cane gacse wee numuh woh dambi-cabti kaah takke, Yalli madqooqik oobiseemil meklá abe wee mari, Toysa woo mari usun daalimiin kinnon
